doc.title: Meandher
doc.plot: Charlie has been in love with his best friend Sylvia for four years, and one night when she gets the flu he races to her aide with chicken noodle soup and the intention of confessing his true feelings for her. But before he can mutter the words, "I love you," Sylvia tells him of a new man to whom she has taken an interest in, Greg, and he suddenly finds himself maintaining the status of her reliable best friend.
